title: Community recommendations
description: Show posts that are recommended by other community members.

title: Tech magazines
description: Show tech news posts that are not related directly to programming, for example, reports about tech companies, startups, venture capital, and scientific discoveries.

title: Newsletters
description: Show posts that were published on developer newsletters. Such posts usually contain curated lists and opinionated essays.

title: Product launches
description: Show posts that aim to help you discover new product launches or major releases to existing developer tools.

title: Showcases
description: Show posts that aim to showcase a project or other types of code snippets. These posts usually provide a demo-only of the showcased work without broader context around it.

title: Non-editorial content
description: Show user-generated posts that were created on external blogging platforms. Such posts are usually not checked by professional editors for fact accuracy, spelling, grammar, and punctuation.

title: Videos
description: Show video posts on my feed

title: Article
description: Show article posts on my feed

title: Share
description: Show share posts on my feed

title: Freeform
description: Show freeform posts on my feed

title: Welcome
description: Show welcome posts on my feed

title: Collection
description: Show collection posts on my feed

title: News
description: Immediate reports and updates on important events and breakthroughs.

title: Opinions
description: Posts expressing personal views, interpretations, or predictions.

title: Listicles
description: Posts formatted as lists that curate multiple items around a topic.

title: Comparisons
description: Posts discussing similarities and differences between entities.

title: Stories
description: Evergreen posts providing context and perspective on events or topics.

title: Tutorials
description: Step-by-step guides focused on a specific skill or topic.

title: Release
description: Announcements or coverage of new versions or product features.

title: Memes
description: Humorous posts reflecting cultural trends and ideas.

title: Drama
description: Posts centered on conflicts or controversy within the industry.

title: Endorsement
description: Posts recommending or praising a product, tool, or approach.

title: Criticism
description: Posts highlighting issues, concerns, or shortcomings.

title: Leak
description: Posts about leaked information or unannounced details.

title: Milestone
description: Posts marking significant achievements or milestones.

title: Hot takes
description: Posts with provocative or strongly opinionated perspectives.
